Posts.Content: Good luck if your new medication is Armidex.  I will be on it for 3 yrs. this coming Jan.  and have experienced alot of discomfort and knee pain especially.  Thats why I'm looking up other peoples experiences with Aromasin.  I'm thinking of trying it but now I'm afraid to after reading other results.  I'll be checking this site to see if anyone has made the switch to Aromasin with good results.  Good luck.
Posts.Title: Side Effects From Aromasin
